Boomerang Casino Australia Bonus: Generous Offers for New and Existing Customers
Boomerang Casino offers Australian players an exciting and diverse bonus program. The platform offers lucrative promotions for new customers, regular players, and high rollers.

During registration, you can choose which welcome bonus to claim. You also have the right to decline the reward. However, this will not prevent you from receiving new rewards and gifts almost every day.
Welcome Bonuses
New players are offered several welcome bonus options. The choice largely depends on whether you enjoy casino games or are visiting this service for sports betting.

In addition to the deposit bonus, you will be asked to activate a promo code upon registration. This is a great opportunity to claim a reward in the form of cash, bonus money, free spins, or free bets.
Casino Welcome Bonus
If you've chosen Boomerang Casino to fully enjoy the gambling experience, then choose the casino bonus for new players.

According to the terms of the promotion, new customers can receive a 100% bonus of up to AUD 750 upon registration. To activate the bonus offer, simply deposit AUD 30 or more. In addition to the AUD 750, you can also claim a package of 200 free spins. These will be awarded over 10 days, with 20 free spins awarded daily.
Welcome Sports Bonus

Sports betting fans at Boomerang Casino can claim a special welcome bonus. This bonus rewards you with a 100% deposit bonus of up to AUD 150. To activate this offer, simply deposit AUD 30 or more. After you place a bet on an event with odds of at least 1.50, you will automatically receive your reward.
Reload Bonuses
Boomerang Casino's promotions don't end with welcome bonuses. In fact, the special offers are just the beginning.
With subsequent deposits for casino games or sports betting, you can activate the corresponding reload bonuses.
Weekly Sports Reload Bonus

Every week, you can make a deposit any day and take advantage of the reload bonus offer. Simply fulfill simple requirements and place a bet on an event with odds of 1.50 or higher. A 50% bonus of up to AUD 750 will be automatically credited to your balance. Only players who deposit AUD 30 or more are eligible for the promotion.
Weekly Casino Reload Bonus

For casino gamers, there's an alternative reload bonus option. The first is available Monday through Thursday. You can deposit AUD 30 or more on any of these days to claim 50 free spins. This promotion is permanent, so you can take advantage of it multiple times.
Weekend Reload Bonus
Casino game fans can expect an even bigger reward on weekends. From Friday to Sunday, make a deposit to claim a bonus of up to AUD 1,050. You have two options.
The first option is to deposit at least AUD 30 and receive a 50% reload bonus. The second option is to deposit AUD 75 or more to claim a 50% bonus and 50 free spins.
Sunday Spins
Every Sunday, Boomerang Casino players have the opportunity to collect 100 free spins:

items: Bet AUD 150 on ELA Games and receive 20 free spins;
Bet AUD 450 to receive an additional 30 free spins;
Bet another AUD 600 on ELA Games to receive 50 free spins.

blocks.text: All earned free spins can be used in the Detective Fortune game.
Cashback Bonuses

In addition to the traditional welcome bonus and reload bonuses, active players can enjoy several exciting cashback offers. Fans of casino games and sports betting can recoup a portion of their losses.
Weekly Casino Cashback

A special weekly offer is available for active casino players. All you need to do is register, make deposits, and play throughout the week. Cashback will be credited to you automatically every Monday.
An important requirement for receiving cashback is reaching one of the VIP levels. The higher your level, the higher the cashback percentage:
The maximum cashback bonus amount for each of the 3 VIP levels is 1,500, 3,000, and 4,500 AUD, respectively. This promotion is ongoing, allowing you to receive cashback every Monday.
Live Cashback
Boomerang Casino has prepared a special cashback bonus for live dealer game fans. VIP level is irrelevant and does not affect the bonus percentage or amount.

Live Cashback is offered weekly from Monday to Sunday. The bonus starts automatically on Monday and is equal to 25% of your total losses for the previous week. The minimum cashback amount is 10 AUD, and live dealer game fans can get back up to 300 AUD per week.
Sports Cashback

If you choose Boomerang Casino to bet on sporting events, you'll have the opportunity to recoup a portion of your losses. If luck hasn't always been on your side during the week, don't worry. Under the terms of the promotion, you can get back 10% of your winnings, up to 750 AUD.

The promotion runs weekly from Monday to Sunday. During this period, you can make deposits and place bets on various sporting events. At the end of the week, you'll receive a 10% bonus of between 30 and 750 AUD. To receive this reward, contact online support chat or email.
VIP Program
The most active players achieve VIP levels. The VIP program unlocks new opportunities, special offers, and removes all restrictions. Players can reach 5 VIP levels:

At the first level, the monthly withdrawal limit is 11,200 AUD, while at the Stone level, it's 40,000 AUD. Starting at the Bronze level, you receive 5% cashback, increased limits, personalized offers, and much more. The Gold level brings you 15% cashback, a withdrawal limit of up to 120,000 AUD, and a personal manager.
Boomerang Casino offers a truly diverse and unique bonus program. So, explore all the permanent and seasonal offers to activate the most profitable gifts that interest you.

How to Create an Account on the Boomerang Casino Website
To create an account on the official Boomerang Casino website, you'll need to complete several steps. The registration process is divided into two stages.

items: On the home page of the site, choose the Register button;
In the resulting menu type in an acceptable email address;
Make a special user name and a strong password;
Check the boxes to indicate you are 18 years of age and become an accuser of the terms and condition of the casino;
Over the registration form, choose one of the options of welcome bonus;
To continue with the second part of the registration form, click on Next Step;
Please enter your name, gender and date of birth;
Choose the country (Australia) and currency (AUD) which can be found in the drop-down menu;
Then, you will need to key in your phone number, city of residence, address, and postal code;
Ensure that you have typed in the information properly, and have not done any mistakes;

blocks.text: You will then receive an email with a link. Click the link to complete the account creation process.
How to Login to a Boomerang Casino Account
Logging in to the website is extremely simple and takes no more than a minute.

The next thing you need to do is: to be able to log in to your newly created account, you have to press the button of log in which is on the other side of the button of register. In the resulting menu, type in your username and password. The next step is to click on the Log In button in order to log in and access your account.

This is not complicated, in case you have forgotten your password. In order to do this, please click on Forget your password. in the menu of logins and read the instructions. In case you cannot recall your username, then press the corresponding button in the same section.
How to Verify at Boomerang Casino
Boomerang Casino is a company that shares significant KYC values. Accordingly, every new registered client must confirm their identity, residential address, and sources of income.

By the moment they are registered, users have already filled in a lot of information about themselves such as their full name, gender, age, residential address etc. Therefore, once you sign in to Boomerang Casino, you will no longer have to fill in your profile. To prove this, you only have to scan copies of documents that prove your personal and contact details.
You can be supported with the help of the following documents:
You can use a photo or scan copy of any of the documents that identify you.
In other cases, the security service of Boomerang Casino may insist on additional verification. As an example you can be asked to send a selfie with an ID.

Confirmation is completed within a period of less than 24 hours. The security service will send you a message that it has successfully verified you. This will ensure that you enjoy every aspect and all privileges of playing at the Boomerang casino site.

Boomerang Casino has prepared a special cashback bonus for live dealer game fans. VIP level is irrelevant and does not affect the bonus percentage or amount.

Live Cashback is offered weekly from Monday to Sunday. The bonus starts automatically on Monday and is equal to 25% of your total losses for the previous week. The minimum cashback amount is 10 AUD, and live dealer game fans can get back up to 300 AUD per week.
Sports Cashback

If you choose Boomerang Casino to bet on sporting events, you'll have the opportunity to recoup a portion of your losses. If luck hasn't always been on your side during the week, don't worry. Under the terms of the promotion, you can get back 10% of your winnings, up to 750 AUD.

The promotion runs weekly from Monday to Sunday. During this period, you can make deposits and place bets on various sporting events. At the end of the week, you'll receive a 10% bonus of between 30 and 750 AUD. To receive this reward, contact online support chat or email.
VIP Program
The most active players achieve VIP levels. The VIP program unlocks new opportunities, special offers, and removes all restrictions. Players can reach 5 VIP levels:

At the first level, the monthly withdrawal limit is 11,200 AUD, while at the Stone level, it's 40,000 AUD. Starting at the Bronze level, you receive 5% cashback, increased limits, personalized offers, and much more. The Gold level brings you 15% cashback, a withdrawal limit of up to 120,000 AUD, and a personal manager.
Boomerang Casino offers a truly diverse and unique bonus program. So, explore all the permanent and seasonal offers to activate the most profitable gifts that interest you.

blocks.text: Boomerang Casino Australia Login: Register and Start an Unforgettable Adventure

Boomerang Casino is deservedly popular among Australian gamblers. It's a versatile platform offering all the options for gambling and betting. A stunning collection of casino games, live dealers, and a sports betting section are all on one platform.

The possibility to play with real money and in demo mode is one of the irrefutable strengths of Boomerang Casino. You do not need to register, log in, and make a deposit in order to access free games. Rather, you just go online and open the game of your choice in the demo version.

The demo mode is perfect for getting to know Boomerang Casino, testing new strategies, and having fun without risk. If you want to experience the adrenaline rush, experience the thrill of winning, and activate a variety of bonuses, you'll need to register.
How to Create an Account on the Boomerang Casino Website
To create an account on the official Boomerang Casino website, you'll need to complete several steps. The registration process is divided into two stages.

items: On the home page of the site, choose the Register button;
In the resulting menu type in an acceptable email address;
Make a special user name and a strong password;
Check the boxes to indicate you are 18 years of age and become an accuser of the terms and condition of the casino;
Over the registration form, choose one of the options of welcome bonus;
To continue with the second part of the registration form, click on Next Step;
Please enter your name, gender and date of birth;
Choose the country (Australia) and currency (AUD) which can be found in the drop-down menu;
Then, you will need to key in your phone number, city of residence, address, and postal code;
Ensure that you have typed in the information properly, and have not done any mistakes;

blocks.text: You will then receive an email with a link. Click the link to complete the account creation process.
How to Login to a Boomerang Casino Account
Logging in to the website is extremely simple and takes no more than a minute.

The next thing you need to do is: to be able to log in to your newly created account, you have to press the button of log in which is on the other side of the button of register. In the resulting menu, type in your username and password. The next step is to click on the Log In button in order to log in and access your account.

This is not complicated, in case you have forgotten your password. In order to do this, please click on Forget your password. in the menu of logins and read the instructions. In case you cannot recall your username, then press the corresponding button in the same section.
How to Verify at Boomerang Casino
Boomerang Casino is a company that shares significant KYC values. Accordingly, every new registered client must confirm their identity, residential address, and sources of income.

By the moment they are registered, users have already filled in a lot of information about themselves such as their full name, gender, age, residential address etc. Therefore, once you sign in to Boomerang Casino, you will no longer have to fill in your profile. To prove this, you only have to scan copies of documents that prove your personal and contact details.
You can be supported with the help of the following documents:
You can use a photo or scan copy of any of the documents that identify you.
In other cases, the security service of Boomerang Casino may insist on additional verification. As an example you can be asked to send a selfie with an ID.

Confirmation is completed within a period of less than 24 hours. The security service will send you a message that it has successfully verified you. This will ensure that you enjoy every aspect and all privileges of playing at the Boomerang casino site.
Boomerang Casino Registered Player Bonus

New Boomerang Casino customers can take advantage of a generous bonus reward. Since the platform offers both casino entertainment and sports betting, you can choose which of the welcome bonuses to activate.

items: Casino Welcome Bonus. Fans of pokies, instant games, and live casino can receive a 100% bonus on their first deposit. The maximum bonus is AUD 750. You'll also receive 200 free spins. To activate the bonus, simply deposit at least AUD 30.

Sports Welcome Bonus. Sports betting enthusiasts have the opportunity to activate an alternative reward. Here, you can receive a 100% bonus on your first deposit of up to AUD 150. To participate, you must top up your balance with AUD 30 or more and place a bet with odds of at least 1.50x.

blocks.text: Choose your bonus rewards based on your personal preferences.
New players can also choose to activate a promo code as a welcome bonus during registration, or decline any new customer rewards.
How to Contact Boomerang Casino Support
The new players can have trouble and queries when it comes to registration, log in, deposit or even bonuses. To get an immediate solution, call 24/7 support. Contact can be made in a number of ways.

items: Live chat. The chat is available 24/7, even unregistered users are allowed to use it;
Email. Experts take a response of 12 hours. Attaching screenshots and documents to your email, you may need to do it;
FAQ. The most commonly asked questions and answers are provided in this section.

blocks.text: Should you need to solve a problem alone, or have a query with the technical support, then please do that using the method you feel most comfortable with.

Boomerang Casino offers a simple and convenient registration form. You can create an account in just a few minutes, make your first deposit, and start enjoying your favorite games, gambling entertainment, and betting on sports events.
